Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Clark/Division. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Clark/Division.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Service Delayed near Armitage
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are standing due to a delay near Armitage. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are standing due to a delay near Armitage. Crews working to restore service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
